description:
Leggings Guys
One day, Ma came in wearing leggings under his pants. The word has a pleasant ring to Bunji`s ears and he got fascinated by it. When he got home, he bugged Mom because he wanted to wear them.
Pajamas
Mom got to a party that the company organized. When Mom was about to deposit her coat at the cloak room, she realized that she was still wearing her pajamas. She tried to get out of the situation, but...
Folding Into Triangles
Fumi loves to fold supermarket plastic bags into triangles. She folds them with Mom. but as Mom`s deadline is close, she can`t stick around with Fumi. A while later, Mom checks out what Fumi has done.
Division
Mom`s Life style math study time has arrived! Today`s theme is division! Can you answer the questions that Mom asks?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Leggings Guys / Pajamas / Folding Into Triangles / Division
レギンス男子 / パジャマ / 三角折り / わり算
